resources.string: Welcome! The first (and only) thing you need to do is select a photo of YOU to insert into photos you share.
Excellent! Now look for me the next time you share a photo.
Nice photo! Touch the background to make it transparent (red).

What is Pinguino?

Pinguino lets you share photos the same as IM or SMS but it inserts YOU into the photo like you were taking a Selfie. Select Pinguino when you share a photo only when you want your image inserted, otherwise use IM or SMS.

First Time Here?

Easy, all you need to do is select a photo of YOU. Use the menu to select a photo. The photo you select probably won\'t have a transparent background. You will be asked to touch the background area to make it transparent. That\'s it! Next time you share a photo, you can select Pinguino and the IM you send will have you inserted.


Can I change my photo?

Sure! Just use the menu again to select a new photo. You will be asked to select the background again just like you did with your first photo.
